verses.text: Clap \w your|strong="H1121"\w* hands, all you peoples; shout \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* God \w with|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1121"\w* triumph.

How awesome \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* Most High, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* great King \w over|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth!
\w He|strong="H3588"\w* subdues nations beneath \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* feet.

\w He|strong="H7272"\w* chooses \w our|strong="H5971"\w* inheritance \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w us|strong="H3816"\w*, \w the|strong="H8478"\w* pride \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Jacob, \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w He|strong="H7272"\w* loves. Selah

God \w has|strong="H5159"\w* ascended amid shouts \w of|strong="H1347"\w* joy, \w the|strong="H3290"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H3290"\w* sound \w of|strong="H1347"\w* \w the|strong="H3290"\w* horn.

Sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w*; sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* King, sing \w praises|strong="H3068"\w*!

\w For|strong="H4428"\w* God \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* all \w the|strong="H2167"\w* earth; \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* profound \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w Him|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 47:7 \ft Or sing a Maskil of praise or sing praises with understanding\f*
God reigns \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations; God \w is|strong="H3605"\w* seated \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* holy throne.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* nobles \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* assembled \w as|strong="H4427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Abraham; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shields \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth belong \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3678"\w* highly exalted.
